quote: Without data, you're just another person with an opinion.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Data is a precious thing and will last longer than the systems themselves.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: In God we trust. All others must bring data.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Data is not just a byproduct of operations, it is a strategic asset.
author: Unknown

quote: Data is the fuel of the future.
author: Unknown

quote: The goal is to turn data into information, and information into insight.
author: Carly Fiorina

quote: Data is the new currency of the digital age.
author: Unknown

quote: Big data is at the foundation of all the megatrends that are happening.
author: Chris Lynch
